name: test_e2e_with_logs[100_XSS_DOM_011]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_011` |
| **Name** | DOM location hash injection |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `location.hash=alert(1)//`
- **Encoded**: `location.hash%3Dalert(1)%2F%2F`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~30000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:18.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_011-1767842058435-c6mcn8 pattern_id=XSS_DOM_011 uri=/?q=location.hash%3Dalert(1)%2F%2F client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
03:14:18.000000000: Critical [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_011-1767842058435-c6mcn8 pattern_id=XSS_DOM_011 uri=/?q=location.hash%3Dalert(1)%2F%2F client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
